definition[0]: if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks
example[0]: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
example[1]: He fractured his right leg during training.
definition[1]: if a group, country etc fractures, or if it is fractured, it divides into parts in an unfriendly way because of disagreement
example[2]: The opposition has been fractured by bitter disputes.
definition[2]: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
example[3]: a stress fracture in his left knee
